New Records: Glenn Phillips made a century off 61 balls
Trent Boult took 4 wickets for 13 runs in T20I cricket, a career-best
Key Match Events: New Zealand bowlers reduced Sri Lanka to 8-4 early in the chase
Glenn Phillips dropped twice before making a century
Trent Boult took a career-best 4 wickets for 13 runs
Dasun Shanaka top-edged a bouncer to Daryl Mitchell
Pre-Game Insights: Kane Williamson said 'anyone can beat anyone' in T20 cricket
He emphasized the importance of focusing on the next game and making adjustments
Post-Match Reflections: Kane Williamson praised Glenn Phillips' knock, calling it 'one of the best knocks I've seen'
Glenn Phillips said he was happy with his process and not just the result
Stuart Clark praised New Zealand's all-round performance, calling it 'exceptional'
Miscellaneous Highlights: New Zealand recovered from 15-3 to post 167-7
Sri Lanka captain Dasun Shanaka said they dropped a few catches and failed to chase down the total
